Posts.Content: Hi I had the same problem during and after my radiotherapy. I kept washing my armpt in the sink about 10 times a day! I use a deodorant block from Lush which I find works very well for me called Aromaco. I love the smell of it which is patchouli which suits me as an aging rocker! Not everyone likes patchouli but they do others aswell! There are no nasties in them them! Veggie xxx
Posts.Title: sweating-arm pit.

Posts.Content: Hi I have been suspected of secondary breast cancer in the brain.AAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGHHH! I had a bone scan last week and get the results on Wednesday when I see the oncolopgist on Wednesday. I also have a ct scan on Tuesday and an annual mammogram on Wednesday too. I am scared stiff . Veggiebab xxx
Posts.Title: secondary bone cancer from breast
